Description: Conveniently located near Inman Square!! Steps from bus stop, close to Harvard Square, Central Square, and Downtown Boston. Minutes from both 93 and Rte. . Recently renovated, apartment features: - Spacious apartment with kitchen, living room, dining room, bedroom, and full bath. - Hardwood floors throughout (recently refinished) - Efficient gas heat - Personal washer and dryer (no coin-op) - Access to the basement for additional storage - Permit Street Parking -Very quiet neighborhood/ unit - No smoking apartment
